abilities.name: Ocean Surface Freezing
abilities.description: Allows the user to freeze the ocean surface, enabling them to ride a bicycle across the sea.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness to seawater and Seastone

strengths.strength: Can freeze large bodies of water including the ocean

keyMoments.title: Hie Hie no Mi Powers Demonstrated
keyMoments.description: Aokiji is seen riding his bicycle across the ocean surface, demonstrating his ability to freeze water with his Ice-Ice Fruit powers.
keyMoments.significance: First visual demonstration of the Hie Hie no Mi's power in the anime, showing its utility for ocean travel.

weaknesses.weakness: Can be reflected by reflective surfaces or shields

keyMoments.title: Slow Slow Beam Reflected
keyMoments.description: Foxy's Slow Slow Beam is deflected back at him by Kibagaeru's sword shield, revealing a weakness in the ability.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates that the Noro Noro no Mi's beams can be countered through tactical defense.
